### Enterprise Data Center Container Solution
#### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: BPM019037/23063
* **Reference Number**: SSC-23-00023063:T
* **Publication Date**: June 22, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: *Expired*

#### Solicitation Description

Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites qualified vendors to submit proposals for the Enterprise Data Center Container Solution. The selected vendor will provide a container management and orchestration solution built on Kubernetes, with essential features such as a secure operating system, continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) toolsets, role-based access control, secure storage services, and support for multitenancy.

The solution must adhere to the Statement of Work and evaluation criteria outlined in the ITQ document, available for download.

#### Amendments

Several amendments have been issued to clarify the solicitation and answer vendor questions:

* Amendment 001 corrected the closing date of the Public key infrastructure (P2P) to July 7, 2023.
* Amendment 002 extended the closing date of the ITQ by one week.
* Amendment 003 answered questions, published a revised version of the ITQ document, and extended the closing date to July 19, 2023.
* Amendment 004 answered questions and published a revised version of the ITQ document with updated Statement of Work and evaluation criteria.
* Amendment 005 answered questions and published a revised version of the ITQ document with updated Statement of Work and evaluation criteria.

#### Important Dates

* Publication Date: June 22, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: *Expired*

#### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

* David Bennett
* Email: [david.bennett5@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:david.bennett5@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 6134629536
* Fax: 6139606026
* Address: 180 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1G 4A8, Canada

#### Attachment 

The solicitation documents are available for download at [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca). 

#### Geographical Scope 

This solicitation is open to qualified vendors worldwide.

#### Area of Use 

The Enterprise Data Center Container Solution will be used across Canada.
